1.Pros: Some of the employees can be great. With the right team it could be a great place to work. .

5.Pros: Flexible hours and the work is easy.
5.Cons: If you close the restaurant you have to clean out the grills which is no fun.

6.Pros: Great environment to grow in leadership and organizational skills, customer service, and employee engagement. You make what you will of this job. If you are committed to personal growth and success, you can do well here. If it's "just a fast-food job," and you complain a lot, you will hate it and they will learn to hate you.

8.Summary: "Really great company, easy going, no stress, flexibility is there, huge work like balance."
8.Pros: Great people, teamwork, flexibility, benefits are fantastic, huge bonus payout, working ours are great! Work is easy. No stressful month end closes.
8.Cons: No room for growth, lack of growth opportunities - you are stuck in one position for years, leadership is shady, people only manage up, wont allow to work from home one person but another one can do whatever they want.

9.Pros: good work experience in customer service
9.Cons: management, hours were at times not accomodating
